description:
Kawai Satomi, who is likely to fail her test, invites Fujimaki to her house to help her study.
I don`t think there will be much studying happening though if I`m gonna be honest...
Source: hanime.tv (modified)

titles.title: Exam Countermeasure of a High School Girl`s Mom
Révisions avec la mère de LA salope du lycée
